body.p: Starting with version 17.1, includes support for some DITA 1.3 features.
To enable DITA 1.3 support in and use the DITA Open Toolkit 2.1 for publishing, , go to DITA, and enter ${frameworksDir}/dita/DITA-OT2.x in the DITA OT directory field.

The following table is a list of DITA 1.3 features and their implementation status: DITA 1.3 Features Implementation Status
Feature Editing Publishing
DITA 1.3 DTD, XML Schema, and Relax NG-based maps/topics/tasks/references, etc. New file templates N/A
Learning Object and Group maps New file templates Not implemented
Troubleshooting specialization Create and edit new troubleshooting topics No special display for troubleshooting elements.
XML markup domain Validation and content completion Implemented
Equation and MathML domain
Validation and content completion
Display and Insert equations
Implemented
SVG domain
Validation and content completion
Display referenced SVG content
Implemented
Other new DITA 1.3 elements (div, strike-through, overline, etc)
Validation and content completion.
Annotations presented in the content completion window and tooltips for new DITA 1.3 elements
Limited support
Release management domain Validation and content completion Not implemented
Scoped keys Define key scopes, resolve keyrefs and conkeyrefs with specified keyscopes Not implemented
Branch filtering Create ditavalrefs Not implemented
Shorthand to address syntax that identifies elements in the same topic Properly resolved for validation, links, and conrefs Implemented
Various table attributes (orientation, rotation, scope, and headers on cells) Not implemented Not implemented
New Map topicref attributes (cascade, deliveryTarget) Allow setting new attributes, propose proper values for them. Not implemented
